TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit IncrementalValueProvider`1<TValue> extends System.ValueType

Docs.typeparam: The type of value that this source provides access to
Docs.summary: Represents a provider of a single value that can be transformed as part of constructing an execution pipeline
Docs.remarks: This is an opaque type that cannot be used directly. Instead an will receive a set of value providers when constructing its execution pipeline. A set of extension methods are then used to create transforms over the data that creates the actual pipeline.
